Package service

Class Menu

  • java.lang.Object
    • service.Menu
  • public class Menu
extends java.lang.Object

    Menu

    The Menu program provides highly abtracted methods for Main program to invoke so that required functions can be called on console, clearly and eficiently.

    Similiar with MVC design model, this program is more like a Controller with methods which are detached away from data access on the Model layer. In this way, this whole project can be efficient and robust, modification of Model layer on the botton would not influence the Controller.

    Since:
    2019-03-20
    Version:
    jdk-10.0.2
    Author:
    Xunjie Liu

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Menu()
      This method is a constructor method which need no input parameter but only initialize some global variables, so that data could be import from bottom.
